titleStmt.title: A sermon of the saints judging the world. Preached at the Assizes holden in Huntingdon, March 13. 1648. by John Gaule, Minister of the Word in Great Staughton.
titleStmt.author: Gaule, John, 1604?-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Dring, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the George in Fleetstreet, near Cliffords-Inns,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
